Layout/SpaceAroundOperators.description:
Description

Use a single space around operators.
Layout/SpaceAroundOperators.option:
This rule supports the following parameters in your configuration:

AllowForAlignment: True (type: bool)
EnforcedStyleForExponentOperator: no_space (type: str)
SupportedStylesForExponentOperator: ['space', 'no_space'] (type: list)
EnforcedStyleForRationalLiterals: no_space (type: str)
SupportedStylesForRationalLiterals: ['space', 'no_space'] (type: list)
